name: WIRELESS INFRASTRUCTURE ASSOCIATION (WIA)
sampleDescriptions: H.R.1 - Bill to provide for reconciliation pursuant to Titles II and V of the concurrent resolution on the budget for fiscal year 2018 (bill formerly known as the Tax Cuts and Jobs Act).

S.19-Mobile Now Act.
General lobbying related to: wireless broadband infrastructure; the FCCs Open Internet order; wireless infrastructure deployment on federal property; wireless broadband deployment
FAA re-authorization provisions related to tower marking.
H.R.1 - Bill to provide for reconciliation pursuant to Titles II and V of the concurrent resolution on the budget for fiscal year 2018 (bill formerly known as the Tax Cuts and Jobs Act).
